text: José María Alberto Inga Guerrero (born 7 October 1999) is a Peruvian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Peruvian Primera División side Sporting Cristal. ==Club career== ===Sporting Cristal=== Inga is a product of Sporting Cristal which he arrived to in 2008 after having played in the academy of Alianza Lima.José Inga: «El equipo me decía que la operación iba a salir bien y que me recuperara pronto», 21 March 2017Sporting Cristal: conoce a José Inga en esta foto interactiva, lacanteradelfutbolperuano.blogspot.com, 2 May 2017 Playing regularly for the club's reserve team, 19-year old Inga was loaned out to fellow league club Ayacucho FC on 26 June 2019 for the rest of the year, to gain more playing experience on a higher level.Sporting Cristal anunció el préstamo de José Inga a Ayacucho FC, libero.pe, 26 June 2019 Returning from the loan spell, Inga got his official debut for Sporting Cristal in the first game of 2020 against UTC Cajamarca, playing all 90 minutes.UTC CAJAMARCA VS. SPORTING CRISTAL 2 - 1, soccerway.com, 1 February 2020 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Living people Category:1999 births Category:Association football midfielders Category:Peruvian footballers Category:Peruvian Primera División players Category:Sporting Cristal footballers Category:Ayacucho FC footballers
title: José Inga
